item.title: Installing pylibmc in ubuntu
item.description: Before you install Pylibmc on your machine, there are a few dependencies that you need to take care of, so as to ensure a successful installation. Install python-dev sudo apt-get install python-dev Install libmemcached sudo apt-get install libmemcached-dev Now you can successfully install pylibmc using pip sudo pip install pylibmc
